sense.dictScrap:
n. ac.
يَسْر 1
Cast lots with arrows.

entryFree.sense: Made to prosper, succeed; aided; abetted.

sense.dictScrap: Drawer of the lot ( in gambling ).

entryFree.sense: Left, on the left; sinister, sinistral.
Stakes; animal to be gambled for.

sense.dictScrap:
pl.
مَيَاْسِرُ 44
Left side; left wing or flank ( army ).

entryFree.form:
يَسَاْر 22
pl.
يَسْرَة 1t , يُسْر 3 , يُسْرَى 3ya , يُسُر 10
),

entryFree.sense: Was hard, unyielding; was despotic, imperious, domineering; was absolute, supreme.
Was a ready speaker, was fluent; was glib of tongue; was sarcastic, caustic; was clamorous, long-tongued.
Sharp; sharptongued, clamorous; sarcastic, caustic, biting.
Was seized with hydrophobia; was rabid; was mad; was enraged.

entryFree.form:
كَلْب 1 , ( pl.
أَكْلُب 16 , كِلَاْب 23 , كَلِيْب 25 , أَكَاْلِبُ 37 , أَكَاْلِيْبُ 69
&

entryFree.sense: Hook; claw; spur; support; nail; strap.

sense.dictScrap: Line, streak ( on a horse's back ).
Whiskers, smellers ( of a cat & c. ),
The stars ν & κ in Taurus.

entryFree.sense: Spent the night in watching, in talking &c.
Middle of a valley; torrent, water-course.

sense.dictScrap: Handful of wool or cotton ( ready for spinning ).

entryFree.sense: Rough skin, leather, stone &c. used for polishing.
